Package ACOAnt

Class ACOAnt

java.lang.Object
ACOAnt.ACOAnt
public class ACOAnt extends Object
The ACOAnt class is responsible for the ant's behaviour. More specifically, it is responsible for the ant's movement and for the ant's path.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    findPath(WeightedGraph graph)
    the findPath method is responsible for choosing the next node that the ant will visit, in case a dead end has been reached
    List<Integer>
    getCurrentPath()
    returns the current path of the ant
    double
    move(Queue list, FeromonasGraph feromonas, Constant file, double time)
    the move method is responsible for monitoring the path of the ant, and deciding what the ant will do next
    void
    resetPaths(int count)
    resets the current path of the ant, after the nest has been reached

      public void resetPaths(int count)

    • move

      public double move(Queue list, FeromonasGraph feromonas, Constant file, double time)
      the move method is responsible for monitoring the path of the ant, and deciding what the ant will do next
      Parameters:
      list - the queue of events
      feromonas - the feromonas graph
      file - the constant file
      time - the time
      Returns:
